intro.title: Welcome to MineScheduler
intro.description: This guide will walk you through the complete user journey from setup to creating your first schedule. Follow the steps in order for the best experience.

form.taskTypeTooltip: Task: Simple time-based | Activity: Quantifiable with rate
form.activityModeDesc: For activities, you can specify a rate (e.g., 30 m/hour for drilling). The system will automatically calculate the output based on duration.
form.rateTooltip: Example: For drilling, enter 30 if the rate is 30 meters per hour

charts.fleetPerformanceDesc: Equipment status distribution and schedule utilization by hour
charts.criticalEquipmentDesc: Equipment requiring immediate action by type

qualityModal.title: Schedule Quality Score Explained
qualityModal.whatIsDesc: Schedule Quality is a composite score (0-100) that measures how well your schedule is optimized. Higher scores indicate efficient resource utilization, minimal conflicts, and optimal task completion.
qualityModal.utilizationDesc: Tasks scheduled vs. available capacity. Higher is better.
qualityModal.completionDesc: Completed tasks vs. planned tasks. Higher is better.
qualityModal.conflictsDesc: Scheduling conflicts and constraint violations. Lower is better.
qualityModal.howToImprove: ðŸ’¡ How to Improve Your Score
qualityModal.tip1: Increase Utilization: Assign more tasks to available equipment during low-utilization hours
qualityModal.tip2: Reduce Conflicts: Review equipment availability, task dependencies, and site constraints
qualityModal.tip3: Maintain Equipment: Keep equipment operational to maximize scheduling flexibility
qualityModal.tip4: Balance Task Limits: Adjust task limits in Settings to match operational capacity
qualityModal.tip5: Monitor Delays: Address recurring delays to improve task completion rates
